title: Everything You Need. All Right Here.
posting_body: ['Welcome to The Huntington Apartments', 'The Huntington is located between Wadsworth and Kipling.', 'If you are coming from Denver just take highway 6th West Bound.', 'Exit Wadsworth South bound.', 'Turn West on W. Girton Ave.', 'Turn Left or South of S. Ammons St. Right or West on W. Floyd Ave.', 'The leasing office is located on the right hand side.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Interested In This Unit?', 'Use this link for more details:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 735 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Dishwashers', '- Oak Cabinetry', '- Energy Star Appliances', '- Personal Balcony or Patio*', '- Wood Burning Fireplaces', '- Cathedral Ceilings with Skylights*', '- Central Air Conditioning and Heat', '- Spacious Walk-in Closets', '- Pet Yards*', '- Linen Closets*', '- Wired for Technology', '- Newly Upgraded interiors', '- In Home Washer and Dryer', '- Designer Two-Tone Paint*', '- Ceiling Fans*', '- Stainless Steel Appliance Packages*', 'Community Amenities', '- 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance', '- Access to Walking and Biking Paths', '- Basketball Court', '- Fire Pit', '- Community Grill', '- Fitness Center', '- Business Center', '- Tennis Court', '- Breathtaking Mountain Views', '- Green Friendly Community', '- Convenient Access to I-25, E-470, I-70', '- Adjoining Sister City Park', '- Resort-Inspired Pool and Year-round Spa', '- On-Site Laundry Facility', '- Minutes from Red Rocks Amphitheatre', '- Carports', 'Pet Policy', 'Pets - Max 2 allowed', 'Comments: We welcome your furry friends here at The Huntington!', 'Max weight is not to exceed 80 lbs for both pets.', 'Restrictions: Breed restrictions do apply.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Sunday:12:00PM-5:00PM', 'The Huntington Apartments', '8223 W Floyd Ave, Lakewood, CO, 80227', 'vbv14OL0Pz']
